name: The Challenge
description: The early 22nd century began the era of "time travel". At this time, the UN Security Council also created the "Time Bureau", a special surveillance service where employees are required to eliminate anachronisms caused by people visiting past events.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (x64) Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 17 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (x64) Processor: Intel i5 4570 @ 3.2 GHz / AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 17 GB available space
